title: (x) I.D. magazine body type - Coranto {Benjamin Shaykin}
content:
Hey! Does anyone know what font I.D. magazine uses for their primary serif-font - body text, headlines, etc.

Here’s a sample from their home page. ( [http://www.idonline.com/images/home\_mar\_frontPage.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104742/http:/www.idonline.com/images/home_mar_frontPage.gif "http://www.idonline.com/images/home\_mar\_frontPage.gif"))

Any help would be MUCH appreciated!  
Thanks,  
Jen

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104742im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/home_mar_frontPage_4883.gif)

 [‹ (x) Looking for the font "Deadwood" - Psy/Ops {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104742/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20064 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Anaiah Isabelle Montecillo 50s script - Monterey (Mahogany Script) {Geoff (Mike)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104742/http:/www.typophile.com/node/20008 "Go to next forum topic")
author: germanny

comments.content: Wow, you’re fantastic. Thanks so much!
